participant_1.name: George
participant_1.personality: Introverted and reflective, with a passion for nature and farming. Enjoys simple pleasures like food and has a sense of independence.
participant_1.background: A bee farmer who feels disconnected from family and values solitude.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Creative and nurturing, with a love for music and wellness. Enjoys activities that promote mindfulness and personal growth.
participant_2.background: A single mom and aspiring yoga instructor, living in Alaska and seeking balance in life.
